tweet: For years, @monero $XMR has been the go-to cryptocurrency for those seeking strong privacy assurances.  New upgrades (such as Kovri integration) seek to further the mission of providing unlinkability and untraceability in cryptocurrency.   https://t.co/abFtFd1LNp

Buying $KAI now is like buying $ETH in early 2017.  Buying $LCX now is like buying $BNB in early 2017.  Buying $XHV now is like buying $XMR im early 2017.  Buying $DEC now is like buying $BAT in early 2017.  FINANCIAL 🤩 FREEDOM 🤩 AWAITS 🤩

3 cryptos had more trading volume than #Litecoin the past 24 hrs ($1.868 bln)  #Bitcoin ($19.29 bln) #Ethereum ($11.38 bln) #USDT ($27.27 bln)  #LTC had > than these #crypto combined ($1.68 bln)  (Rank) #ADA (7)  #LINK (9)  #CRO (10)  #BNB (11)  #XTZ (13)  #XLM (14)  #XMR (15)

Monero is a cryptocurrency built on the principles of unlinkability and untraceability. This means that you should not be able to make a connection between transactions, nor should you be able to determine the source or destination of funds.  Learn more 👇  https://t.co/F6QAvuA8v7
